bt.net.pipeline

Interface ChannelPipeline

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChannelPipeline

    public interface ChannelPipeline
    Encapsulates the algorithm of encoding/decoding data, that is transfered between two peers.
    Since:
    1.6

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChannelHandlerContext bindHandler(ChannelHandler handler)
      Attach channel handler to this pipeline
      Message decode() 
      boolean encode(Message message) 

    • Method Detail

      • decode

        Message decode()
        Returns:
        Incoming message, if there is sufficient data to decode it, or null
        Since:
        1.6

      • encode

        boolean encode(Message message)
        Parameters:
        message - Outgoing message to encode
        Returns:
        true, if there is sufficient space to encode the message
        Since:
        1.6

      • bindHandler

        ChannelHandlerContext bindHandler(ChannelHandler handler)
        Attach channel handler to this pipeline
        Since:
        1.6
